places.name: Eiffel Tower
places.description: A wrought-iron lattice tower on the Champ de Mars in Paris, France. It is one of the most recognizable structures in the world.

places.name: Louvre Museum
places.description: The world's largest art museum and a historic monument in Paris, France.
